title: Is the song that sings 'Paranoia, paranoia, everyone's coming to get me' by Green Day? - Quora

response.answer_text: I literally copied your question, verbatim, pasted it into a Google search box, then removed ‘Green Day’, and hit enter… ….this is what came up:  Harvey Danger, have fun, and in the future you’ll know how to answer these types of questions yourself. Simply ask Google, or Jeeves, or Bing, or Duck Duck Go, or whatever you prefer. It’s fast and simple and doesn’t rely on complete strangers doing things for you that you can easily do yourself.

Nope. They don't even sound like Green Day…for real the guy that sings the song your talking about sounds completely different. I mean… the difference is obvious to me at least… I guess not for everyone else though. X_x The song your talking about is by Harvey Danger - “Flagpole Sitta” Classic 90s music. Also one of my favorites. :D Here is a link for those of you out there who also confuse this guy with other kinda punk rock bands.
